A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Garbage. If you want to know how to maintain a legacy whilst doing something new\, that also touches and connects with audiences\, see Blade Runner 2049.

If you want to ruin a franchise\, destroy the legacy of older characters\, use weak and disconnected young characters\, if you want to bore people to death with special effects and jokes that don't make people laugh. Make a film like this. Just the worst film I've ever seen in terms of reality vs required expectation.

For how to do a Star Wars movie right in this day and age\, see Rogue One.

Any critic who is not a moron should be tearing this to shreds. The world has gone mad. I guess the critics got paid off by Disney from all the money from the moron special effects loving masses.
